info.name: Careers NIT Kurukshetra - API
info.description:
Production-ready API collection for the NIT Kurukshetra Recruitment Portal.

Setup:
1. Import the environment file (postman_environment.json)
2. Set your credentials in the environment variables
3. Run any Login request to auto-save the token
4. Run List Active Jobs to auto-capture jobId
5. Run Create Application to auto-capture appId

All dynamic IDs (jobId, appId, noticeId, userId) are auto-captured.
Switch roles by running the appropriate login request.

request.description: Returns server status and DB connection state. No auth required.

item.name: Auth
item.description: Registration, login (all 4 roles), logout, token refresh, profile, email verification, and password reset.

request.description: Creates a new applicant account. Verification OTP is sent automatically.
Logs in as applicant. Token is auto-saved.
Logs in as admin. Token is auto-saved.
Logs in as reviewer. Token is auto-saved.
Logs in as super_admin. Token is auto-saved.
Clears refresh-token cookie and invalidates session.
Pass refreshToken in body OR let it be read from httpOnly cookie.
Returns authenticated user profile.
Sends verification OTP to email. Use after registration.
Confirms OTP. Check inbox/console for OTP value.
Sends password reset OTP. Always returns 200 to prevent email enumeration.
Resets password using OTP from email.

item.name: Public
item.description: Public endpoints (no auth): jobs, departments, notices.

request.description: Filter by category using optional query param.

item.name: Applications
item.description: Application CRUD. Run "Login as Applicant" first.

request.description: Creates application for a job. Requires verified email.
Only allowed on draft applications.

item.name: Application Sections
item.description: All section saves, validates, and file uploads. Run "Create Application" first.

body.raw:
{
  "data": {
    "postAppliedFor": "Assistant Professor Grade-I (Level-12)",
    "departmentDiscipline": "Computer Science & Engineering",
    "category": "GEN",
    "disability": false,
    "name": "Dr. Ravi Kumar",

    "fatherName": "Mr. Rajesh Kumar",

    "gender": "Male",
    "maritalStatus": "Married",
    "aadhar": "123456789012",
    "corrAddress": "H.No. 42, Sector 7",
    "corrCity": "Kurukshetra",
    "corrDistrict": "Kurukshetra",
    "corrState": "Haryana",
    "corrPincode": "136118",
    "mobile": "9876543210",
    "sameAsCorrespondence": true,
    "permAddress": "H.No. 42, Sector 7",
    "permCity": "Kurukshetra",
    "permDistrict": "Kurukshetra",
    "permState": "Haryana",
    "permPincode": "136118",
    "specialization": [
      "Machine Learning",
      "Computer Vision"
    ],
    "phdTitle": "Deep Learning for Medical Image Segmentation",
    "phdUniversity": "IIT Delhi",
    "phdDate": "2015-05-20",
    "degreeFromTopInstitute": [
      "PhD Degree",
      "PG Degree"
    ],
    "scopusId": "57200000000"
  }
}

request.description: Auto-calculated credits from saved sections.

formdata.description: Merged PDF of all certificates. Max 3MB.

item.name: Submission and Payment
item.description: Pre-submission validation, final submit, withdrawal, receipt, and payment.

request.description: Pre-submission check. Returns incomplete/invalid sections.
Locks the application permanently.
Downloads submission receipt PDF. Only for submitted applications.
Creates payment order for application fee.
Stripe webhook. Cannot be tested manually (needs Stripe signature). For documentation only.

item.name: Admin
item.description: Admin/super_admin endpoints. Run "Login as Admin" or "Login as Super Admin" first.

request.description: All applications for a specific job.
Exempts application fee. Admin or super_admin only.
Draft to active.
Closes job before end date.
Super Admin creates admins; Admin creates reviewers.
Only super_admin can promote.
Admin or super_admin. PDF optional.
Attach new file to replace PDF.
Soft-archives (isActive=false).

item.name: Negative Tests
item.description: Error handling: invalid credentials, missing auth, validation failures, forbidden access, 404.

request.description: Login as Applicant first. Expect 403.
